title: If i buy hextech gunblade (that heals on all dmg) can on hit heal me?
body: Wits end,Nashors,Bork etc. will their on hit damage heal me or not?

replies.body:
Due to the exact wording of...

>  Instantly heal for 15% of **all** damage dealt, including physical, magic, and true damage.

makes me think it should apply the healing from the extra item damage as well. Feel free to correct me if you discover something different!!
